text: Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Apex Legends and Elden Ring. The build quality of the AORUS 5 NA-7US1121SH i7-9750H NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 4 GB GDDR5 16 GB Memory 256 GB Intel SSD 1 TB HDD Win10 15.6" LG FHD 144 Hz Gaming Laptop is solid, and the battery life is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for competitive gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1650. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The build material is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the AORUS 5 NA-7US1121SH i7-9750H NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 4 GB GDDR5 16 GB Memory 256 GB Intel SSD 1 TB HDD Win10 15.6" LG FHD 144 Hz Gaming Laptop!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for content creation and gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1650 in the AORUS 5 NA-7US1121SH i7-9750H NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 4 GB GDDR5 16 GB Memory 256 GB Intel SSD 1 TB HDD Win10 15.6" LG FHD 144 Hz Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.
